top_comments_top.body:
This is really bad.

One of the very first things we run into with software engineering is NEVER, and I mean NEVER trust user input. Anything from the client is considered user input. 

All data from the client needs to be sanity checked, sanitized and reliant on the server for the ultimate confirmation. 

This is crazy, really.
Kind of glad I didn't get into this at this point.  Not like I have time for MMOs anymore, but I have never heard of such a game breaking exploit.
